roleset.name: to contaminate, deteriorate from normal standard

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 being corrupted

example.name: Args 1, 3
example.text: There is no point in having a booming economy if the country is socially corrupt.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. VerbNet entry 45.4. frame by Claire. Based on noun frame corruption.01.
